title: London/Westminster
name: CASK Pub & Kitchen
content: One of RateBeer's Top 50 bars in the world, and only one of two in the UK (see The Craft Beer Company in [[London/Holborn-Clerkenwell|Clerkenwell]] for the other).  A specialist beer bar with a regularly changing selection of real ales and craft beer casks, plus a larger assortment of local and international bottles.  Monday to Saturday, gourmet burgers are served by Forty Burgers; with traditional British roasts on Sundays.
